name: oneuptime
description: OneUptime is a complete open-source monitoring and status page service. It provides uptime, workflow tracking, alerts, SLOs, and on-call management for self-hosted or SaaS deployment.
features: Uptime monitoring: Check website and API availability with HTTP, TCP, and ping monitors from multiple locations.
Status pages: Create public or private status pages to communicate service health and incidents to users.
Alert management: Receive notifications via email, SMS, Slack, or webhooks when monitors detect issues or recover.
On-call scheduling: Manage rotation schedules and escalation policies for incident response teams.
SLO tracking: Define and monitor service level objectives with automatic reporting on compliance and violations.
Incident management: Track issues from detection through resolution with timeline, notes, and team collaboration.
Performance metrics: Collect and visualize response times, uptime percentages, and availability trends over time.
API monitoring: Test API endpoints with custom headers, authentication, and response validation for comprehensive checks.
